languages.text: "Алый — хороший цвет для боевого облачения. Враги не увидят слабость, даже если ты истекаешь кровью".
"Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."
languages.original_text: "Алый — хороший цвет для боевого облачения. Враги не увидят слабость, даже если ты истекаешь кровью".

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “深红色最适合战斗服。即使血流不止，也不会让敌人看出任何破绽。”
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: “深红色最适合战斗服。即使血流不止，也不会让敌人看出任何破绽。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'avantage d'une armure rouge écarlate, c'est que l'ennemi ne peut pas voir quand on saigne. »
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: « L'avantage d'une armure rouge écarlate, c'est que l'ennemi ne peut pas voir quand on saigne. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Purpur ist eine gute Farbe für Kampfkleidung. Feinde nehmen keine Schwäche war, nicht einmal, wenn man blutet."
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: "Purpur ist eine gute Farbe für Kampfkleidung. Feinde nehmen keine Schwäche war, nicht einmal, wenn man blutet."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「真紅は戦闘服に適した色よ。たとえ血を流しても、敵には弱さは見えないからね」
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: 「真紅は戦闘服に適した色よ。たとえ血を流しても、敵には弱さは見えないからね」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El carmesí es un buen color para la indumentaria de batalla. Los enemigos no percibirán ninguna debilidad aunque sangre».
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: «El carmesí es un buen color para la indumentaria de batalla. Los enemigos no percibirán ninguna debilidad aunque sangre».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

languages.text: "Kızıl, savaş kıyafetleri için iyi bir renktir. Düşmanlar, kanın oluk oluk aksa bile zayıflığını fark edemez."
languages.original_text: "Crimson is a good colour for battle attire. Enemies will perceive no weakness, not even if you are bleeding."

traits.locale_text: "Kızıl, savaş kıyafetleri için iyi bir renktir. Düşmanlar, oluk oluk kanasan bile zayıflığını algılamaz."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
